titleStmt.title: Articles of visitation and inquiry concerning matters ecclesiastical Exhibted [sic] to the ministers, church-wardens, and side-men, of every parish within the arch-deaconry of Wells. In the diocess of Bath and Wells. And is very useful for all the diocesses in England. The tenour of the oath of the church-wardens, and sworn men. You shall swear, that you, and every of you, shall faithfully execute your several offices of church-wardens and side-men, according to law, to the best of your skill and knowledge. So help you God, and the contents of his Holy Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Archdeaconry of Wells.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by A. Baldwin in Warwick-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
